DOC.brief_summary: Human Papilloma virus ( HPV ) viruses cause common infection skin genitals men woman . Several type HPV infection transmit sexual activity , woman , infect cervix ( part uterus womb ) . This infection often go away , go away ( call persistent infection ) , lead woman long period time cancer cervix . If woman infect HPV , unlikely get cervical cancer . This study evaluate safety immunogenicity GSK Biologicals HPV-16/18 vaccine 12 month , pre-teen adolescent woman 10-14 year age study start . Approximately 2000 study subject receive HPV vaccine control vaccine ( hepatitis A vaccine ) administer intramuscularly accord 0-1-6 month schedule .
